name: roadtoromeapp.com
description: Promotional website for the mobile application Road To Rome

scripts.build:js: source .env && browserify src/main.js -t babelify -t yo-yoify -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-es2015-template-literals ] ] -t envify > public/main.js
scripts.build:css: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-media -u autoprefixer src/main.css --map --output public/main.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css
scripts.compress: npm run compress:js & npm run compress:css
scripts.watchify: source .env && watchify src/main.js -d -o public/main.js -t babelify -t envify
scripts.start: npm run watchify & npm run nodemon & http-server public -s -p 3000
